dict.string:
Bodyweight Exercise:
1. Brisk five-minute warmup walk
2. Then jog 4km (or 25 minutes).

Gym Workouts: (Legs) 60 - 90 sec rest between sets
1. Back Squat: Reps - 8,8,10,12 for 4 sets 2. Leg Squat: Reps - 8,8,10,12 for 4 sets 3. Seated Leg Curl: Reps - 8,8,10,12 for 4 sets 4. Romanian Deadlift: Reps - 8,8,10,12 for 4 sets 5. Standing Calf Raise: Reps - 25 for 3 sets 6. Seated Calf Raise: Reps - 25 for 3 sets

Bodyweight Exercise:
1. Brisk five-minute warmup walk
2. Then jog 4km (or 25 minutes).

Gym Workouts: (Push) 60 - 90 sec rest between sets
1. Incline Barbell Bench Press: Reps - 10,10,12,15 for 4 sets 2. Dumbbell Flye: Reps - 10,10,12,15 for 4 sets 3. Overhead Dumbell Press: Reps - 10,10,12,15 for 4 sets 4. Smith Machine Upright Row: Reps - 10,10,12,15 for 4 sets 5. Lying Ez-Bar Tricep Extension: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets 6. Dumbell Kickback: Reps - 10,12,15 for 3 sets
